to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: OT: For Gregory Nowak
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

That's one of my backup mx's, which is down. I'm not sure why it would
be trying that, since my primary mx has been up. I have gotten your
message this morning, and have replied to it, so I hope these
temporary communication errors have been taken care of, whatever was
causing them. Thanks.

Greg


On Wed, Apr 18, 2007 at 09:51:35AM -0400, Janina Sajka wrote:
> My apologies for using the list this way, but my attempts at direct
> communication are failing as below.
> 
> This is for Gregory Nowak.
> 
> Gregg, We've received your emails concerning the Owasys 22C and I have
> attempted to respond. However, our mail to you isn't being delivered as
> per the following error:
> 
> 
> The original message was received at Wed, 18 Apr 2007 00:50:44 GMT
> from localhost.localdomain [127.0.0.1]
> 
>    ----- Transcript of session follows -----
> 451 4.4.1 reply: read error from linserver.romuald.net.eu.org.
> ... Deferred: Name server:
> sabahattin-gucukoglu.com.:
> +host name lookup failure
> Warning: message still undelivered after 4 hours
> Will keep trying until message is 5 days old
> 
> Janina
> 
> 
> _______________________________________________
> Speakup mailing list
> Speakup@braille.uwo.ca
> http://speech.braille.uwo.ca/mailman/listinfo/speakup

- -- 
web site: http://www.romuald.net.eu.org
gpg public key: http://www.romuald.net.eu.org/pubkey.asc
skype: gregn1
(authorization required, add me to your contacts list first)

- --
Free domains: http://www.eu.org/ or mail dns-manager@EU.org
